Description: A leading company located in King Abdulla II Industrial City is looking to hire a ProcessDevelopment Engineer.1- Reviewing and evaluating procedures, and workflows for different departments withinthe company.2- Identifying gaps in procedures and work methods used and recommending a method ofreform.3- Innovate, design, develop, optimize, and implement manufacturing processes,procedure, tooling, and equipment in support of production flow.4- Establish standard work and standard equipment operating parameters.5- Analyze quality problems and develop solutions and improvements.6- Work with procurement and quality department to resolve supplier quality issues.7- Enforce compliance with all good manufacturing practices and standard operatingprocedures as defined by the company’s policies, practices, and procedures.Skills
Skills: The salary range will be: 750 JD up to 1100 JD.
